hero_section.title: FAST CLEAN SERVICE
subtitle: Your clean card is our calling card!
The number 1 in the field of specialist car cleaning!
We come on location.

about_section.title: The Best Care for Your Car Wherever You Want!
about_section.description: At Fast Clean Service, we provide professional steam cleaning and car detailing—on location or at our branch. Using eco-friendly techniques, we ensure your car is cleaned and protected with exceptional attention to detail.

features.title: Convenience
features.description: Cleaning on location or at our branch.

cta.text: Book online or request a free quote today!

steps.title: Choose your location
steps.description: We come to you or you bring your car to us.

steps.title: Choose your service
steps.description: Select from our extensive range of cleaning and detailing services.

steps.title: Make an appointment
steps.description: Choose a date and time that suits you.

services_section.title: OUR SERVICES
services_section.description: At Fast Clean Service we offer a wide range of services to keep your car in top condition. From exterior to interior, we have the expertise and techniques to do each aspect of your vehicle.

services.title: Steam Cleaning Interior & Exterior
services.description: Provide a deeply cleaned car with our environmentally friendly steam cleaning techniques. Book Now and give your car the fresh start it deserves.

services.title: Steam Cleaning Interior & Exterior
services.description: Protect your car’s paint and make it shine again with our professional wax and coating treatments. Plan Your Detailing and keep your car looking new for longer.

services.title: Polishing and Headlight Restoration
services.description: Remove scratches and regain the brightness of your headlights for a brighter shine result. Request a Quote for your polishing job.

customer_reviews_section.title: What Our Customers Say
customer_reviews_section.description: At Fast Clean Service we have already helped many satisfied customers. Leave Your Review and tell us how we helped you!

packages.title: Anywhere Auto-Care
packages.description: We bring the latest steam cleaning technology to your location, ensuring your vehicles are professionally cleaned and ready to go!

packages.title: FleetCare Pro
packages.description: Tailored cleaning solutions for businesses with multiple vehicles. We ensure your fleet stays spotless and road-ready.

packages.title: Subscriptions
packages.description: Hassle-free car care with regular service packages. Enjoy consistent maintenance at discounted rates.

packages.title: Long term Vehicle Care
packages.description: Long-term vehicle maintenance plans to ensure your car remains in peak condition with additional care options.

anywhere_autocare_section.title: Anywhere AutoCare
anywhere_autocare_section.description: We have different packages to choose from depending on your needs. Each package has been carefully put together to provide your car with the best care, whether it is a standard cleaning or a complete detail treatment.

services.title: On-Site Service
services.description: Enjoy our services at our dedicated location, where you can relax while we take care of your vehicle.

services.title: Mobile Service
services.description: Enjoy our services at your location, where you can relax while we take care of your vehicle.

packages.name: Standard
packages.description: Book Now for a quick and thorough cleaning.

packages.name: Deluxe
packages.description: Choose Deluxe for a complete treatment of your car.

packages.name: Premium
packages.description: Book Now for the ultimate showroom finish.

services.title: FleetCare Pro
services.description: Elevate your fleet’s appearance with our cutting-edge mobile cleaning service. FleetCare Pro brings professional-grade steam cleaning technology directly to your location, ensuring your vehicles are spotless and ready for the road - anywhere, anytime.
services.highlight: With FleetCare Pro, pristine vehicles are just a booking away.

services.title: Subscriptions
services.description: Transform your vehicle maintenance routine with our flexible subscription plans. Experience premium care tailored to your schedule and preferences.
services.highlight: Choose your plan and never worry about a dirty car again!

other_vehicles_care_section.title: Other Vehicles Care
other_vehicles_care_section.description: Ensure your vehicles' longevity with our comprehensive maintenance plans designed to keep your car in optimal condition for years to come.

categories.name: Cars
categories.description: We provide specialized steam cleaning that avoids scratches and restores your car’s shine.

categories.name: Campers, Caravans, Boats, and Trucks
categories.description: We offer comprehensive interior and exterior steam cleaning, including detailed cabin sanitization and engine cleaning for ultimate freshness and performance.

categories.name: Bikes
categories.description: Whether it's a casual ride or a high-performance machine, we’ve got your two-wheelers covered with professional cleaning and care services.

services.title: On-Site Service
services.description: Our experienced professionals come to you with our own material.

services.title: Time Efficiency
services.description: Top-quality mobile steam cleaning that saves you time.

services.title: Open 7 Days a Week
services.description: Get in touch with us through various channels.

services.description: Just book the appointment online and leave the rest to us.

services.title: Eco-Friendly
services.description: We use 3 liters per car for great results.

services.title: Interior Care
services.description: Find answers to frequently asked questions.

aboutus.BackgroundSectionHeading: We offer mobile car cleaning at your convenience anytime and anywhere. Our steam cleaning technique ensures a deep, thorough clean, reaching even the toughest spots. Equipped with modern supplies in our vans, we provide efficient, professional service for all types of vehicles.
